text: The women's double sculls rowing event at the 2015 Pan American Games was held from July 11–13 at the Royal Canadian Henley Rowing Course in St. Catharines. ==Schedule== All times are Eastern Standard Time (UTC-3). {| class="wikitable" ! Date ! Time !
